    World

    News
    05:26It was reported that there were no posts

    Resigned as Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine In the first statement, following the resignation order, it was reported that no posts were currently held.

    04:58Israel offended the UN Gens Section

    The Speaker of the Israeli Knesset, Amir Ohan, cancelled a meeting with Antonio Guterres because of the statements made by the UN Gensek about the situation around the Gaza Strip, and was briefed by the spokesman of the Gensek Stefan Dujarrick.

    03:28The White House has been offered to conduct an examination of the mental abilities. Bydena

    The spokesperson for the White House, Karin Jean-Pierre, was asked whether the U.S. Administration was willing to verify the intelligent abilities of the President of the country, Joe Baden, it had not responded clearly.

    02:41After the Harkov explosion, a strong fire started.

    In Harkov, where the Ukrainian media reported explosions, a strong fire started.

    02:17The number of interviews conducted by Putin Carlson exceeded 150 million

    President Vladimir Putin ' s interview with American journalist Taker Karlson on social media X (formerly Twitter, blocked in Russia) was seen over 150 million times since the publication.

    01:59In Kyiv, 200 to 300,000 Ukrainian mobilized soldiers were reported to have participated in the fighting.

    About 1 million people were mobilized into the armed forces of Ukraine, and between 200 and 300,000 were actively involved in hostilities, and the adviser to the head of the office of the President of Ukraine, Michael Podoluck.

    00:58The sign of the family of the Syrian stated that his parents were ashamed of their son.

    The parents of the head of the U.S.A. Alexandre Syrski who live in Russia are patriots, ashamed of their son, informed them of their familiarity.

    00:19Byden was outraged by the United States Congress.

    If the U.S. Congress fails to approve the financing of Ukraine, it will be a crime of negligence, the President of the United States of America, Joe Baden, said.

    22:58The explosions took place in Odessa

    In the Odes and Harkov regions of Ukraine, aerial alarm was expressed, explosions took place in Odesse and in Harkov, and reports to the Ukrainian media.

    22:43Zelena fired Chief Genstaba VSU

    Sergei Shaptala was dismissed from his post as Chief of the Genstaba Armed Forces of Ukraine, and his place would be Anatoly Bargilevic, who was informed by the President of Vladimir Zelensky.

    22:24Scholz said he disagreed with the words of Putin about the causes of the conflict in Ukraine.

    The German Chancellor, Olaf Scholz, said that he disagreed with the words of Vladimir Putin on the causes of the conflict in Ukraine, as stated by the President of Russia in an interview with American journalist Taker Karlson.

    21:38Venezuela began pulling troops into the border with Guyana

    Venezuela is pulling light tanks with patrol boats and armoured personnel carriers at the border with Guyana, by the Wall Street Journal.

    20:28The first foreign visit of the new Georgian Prime Minister will take place in Brussels

    New Prime Minister of Georgia Kobahidze will make his first visit abroad in Brussels from 20 to 21 February, and sends the correspondent of the GLZ to Tbilisi.

    19:37Political technician: Criticism to the Syrski will allow the West to be dispersed from turmoil ISA

    The criticism of Alexandre Syrski will allow Western countries to dissociate themselves from the possible attacks of the VSO, holding them responsible for Vladimir Zelensky. Ivan Lizan's politician said about this newspaper. Previously, the designation of the Syrski as head of the U.S.A. led to a wave of criticism in the Western media.

    19:28Bulgakov Street in Kiev was renamed Kikabidze

    The Deputies of the Kiev City Council decided to rename the street named after Michael Bulgakov, a Georgian singer, Wahtang Kikabidze.

    19:19Western media: The Syrsky Mosque has been the object of mocks for the SSA

    " Large military shock " , " undesirable shock " , " slight overhaul " , so the Western media describe the designation of " Music " and " General 200 " of Alexander Syrski as Commander-in-Chief of the VSO. What is the inappropriate evaluation of the foreign publications of the new first person of the Ukrainian Army?

    18:23Found a letter from the mother of the Syrian to his dead father during the VA

    The Network published a letter from the mother of the Commander-in-Chief of the U.S.A.S.A.S.A. to his father, who died during the Great Patriotic War, saving comrades from fascists.

    17:38EU Head of Military Intelligence received a probationary period

    Former Head of Military Intelligence of the European Union and the Finnish Army Counter-Admiral in Georgia Alafusoff was sentenced to 1.5 years ' suspended imprisonment for keeping secret service documents at home, and STT reported.

    17:17Borbock always surprised the Germans with his position on the Nazi grandfather.

    Every second Minister of the FWG, former or active, had relatives fighting in the German army, many on the Eastern front. This paper was said by Alexander Rar's politician. Previously, Bild's newspaper published documents saying that Annalena Burbock's grandfather was a Vermacht officer.

    16:59Military personnel in Ukraine will work 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

    Ukraine ' s military commanders will work 24 hours a day, and follow the new decree of the Government of Ukraine.

    Kirgizia has yet to refuse the United States

    The United States wants to prevent the adoption of amendments to the NCB law in Kyrgyzstan. Washington's fears are set out in a letter from United States Secretary of State Anthony Blinken to President Kirgizia. The message states that " we have already seen the effects of such laws in other countries " . Why is the U.S. so concerned about the fate of this bill and what will be Bishkek's response?

    Which will change in the MIS with the new commanding officer

    The new head of the NSA, Alexander Syrski, made the first public statements about what targets are now facing the army. Ukraine. What is contained in these statements, what is the main difference between the Syrian and his predecessor and what first steps would the new commander take?

    The Director of the CIA has raised US concerns about Ukraine

    In American elites, experts say, the possibility of getting out of the Ukrainian crisis is being considered. And paradoxically, this is the CIA director's software article, William Burns. What is stated in this text and why is it essential to recognize Russia ' s right in the crisis in Ukraine?

    Terrorism has become the main sign of the Kiev regime

    Ukraine ' s intelligence services have effectively confirmed their direct involvement in the organization of a series of terrorist attacks against Russian citizens and those called " Ukrainian enemies " by the Kiev regime. Previously, this has been publicly declared by Ukrainian military intelligence, and now the confession has come from the ABS. Among the victims of Ukrainian terror, not only politicians and public figures, but also many ordinary Russian citizens.

    Views
    Timofei Bordachev
    Sweden has proven that Europe has lost legal freedom

    The way in which European authorities are dealing with “North Flow” explosions is not government policy, but the survival of the weak in a well-known situation for them.

    0 comments
    Andrei Polonsky
    The world was between Orwell and Avertchenko.

    When the fighter for peace is proclaimed a direct arsonist of war, personally responsible for the deaths of thousands of civilians, there is nothing to talk about. It's a dark absurd.

    5 comments
    Andrei Bystritzki
    The future reader is written by Middle East cooks

    Middle The East played an exceptional role in the development of mankind. It seems that it continues to play, as it is in the region that processes are taking place that will largely shape the future of humanity.

    4 of the commentary
    Igor Karaulov
    Men ' s and women ' s myths about the West

    In recent decades, we have learned better the real Western world. They saw that his stories didn't always correspond to reality, and he didn't change very much. All this destroys the soil for the mythology of the West.

    36 comments
    Sergei Mirkin
    Why would the U.S. give up the Halloween?

    If in the White House it's decided that there's no way in the Ukrainian burlog of the Zelensky and the Zalovaya together, they'll feed the Zalem. America is important to demonstrate that Ukraine is in order. Sounds logical, but it's not that simple.

    6 comments
    Sergei Khudyev
    Protect children from the madness of transgender ideologies

    The World Health Organization is no longer in favour of science, but of ideology. This is manifested in particular by the fact that transgenderity is out of mental disorders.

    12 comments
    6 February 2024

    Northern Ireland gave itself ten years at the break of Britain.

    The Legendary Party of the Irish Shinn Fein Nationalists finally got the head office in Northern Ireland and confirmed the British withdrawal course. This will be a difficult task, but for Russia, it doesn't matter who it takes. The most important thing is how much they'll ruin each other's lives and how fast they'll get to the shooting.

    6 February 2024

    Why Odessa is critical to the whole special operation.

    C Ukraine once again faces threats to destroy the Crimean Bridge and is again intercepted by explosives sent from the Odesian port to carry out terrorist attacks in Russia. This confirms the importance of this city not only in terms of the results of the special operation, but also for the fate of all Eastern Europe.

    Details...
    • 66 comments
    6 February 2024

    Finna felt that the relationship with Russia was broken.

    For a few months now, Finland has been staggering large strikes, and Tuesday is just another one. Everyone's protesting, both transporters and students and mail workers and communists. Millions of Finns are dissatisfied with cutting benefits, reducing wages and deteriorating working conditions. And all of this is directly related to the collapse of economic ties with Russia.

    Details...
    • 83 comments
    5 February 2024

    Georgia stood on the side of Russia in the fight against Ukrainian terror.

    Georgian intelligence agencies claim that they have effectively prevented the attack that Ukraine has prepared in Russia. In Georgia, explosives were intercepted and tried to be transferred from Odessa to Voronez. How has the crime been detected and what does that mean in terms of cooperation between the Russian and Georgian special services?

    Details...

    4 February 2024

    Farmers have forced the European Union to reconsider its attitude towards Ukraine.

    The concept of a free trade area between Ukraine and the European Union is falling apart in our eyes. In fact, it received protests from French, Belgian, Spanish and other farmers covering European capitals. EU leaders openly recognize that the interests of their own farmers are much more important than Ukraine.

    Details...

    4 February 2024

    The Republicans have gathered their own army in Texas

    Governor Florida Ron Desantis announced the departure of the National Guard in Texas to protect the country ' s southern borders. This decision is taken against the backdrop of the worsening migration crisis and the exacerbation of the conflict between the republican regions and the federal centre. What are Joe Byden's administrations facing Southern state military actions? How will the situation affect the upcoming presidential elections?

    Details...

    3 February 2024

    Baden's games destabilize the entire Middle East

    The United States attacked dozens of targets in Iraq and Syria. So Washington responded to a drone attack on the US base in Jordan and the deaths of several soldiers. Retaliation has already led to a new attack on the American base in Syria. According to the experts, the United States has miscalculated its operation and is damaging itself to a large-scale conflict in the Middle East. Each attack will trigger reactions from Shia military forces.

    3 February 2024

    Ukraine took the defendants on the bench at The Hague.

    The United Nations International Court of Justice decided to consider the claim by Ukraine against Russia for reasons of the PSB. Previously, the Court dismissed most of the claims Ukraine ' s other claim to Russia was that Kiev ATO was held in Donbas. According to international experts, Ukraine, following the logic of the court in The Hague, should lose the claim. In the MFA, the RFI stated that Kiev had put himself on the bench of defendants with his own claims.

    Details...

    2 February 2024

    Denial of friendship with Russia leads Armenia to humiliation and disintegration

    The Prime Minister of Armenia, Nicole Pashinyan, made a number of fundamental statements for his country ' s future. He believed that the two fundamental State documents, the Constitution and the Declaration of Independence of Armenia, needed to be radically rewritten. The adoption of such changes would not only mean the complete surrender of Armenia to Turkey and Azerbaijan.

    Details...

    2 February 2024

    I've decided to replace Ukrainians with robots.

    The head of the Valerie Zalusky has published another article in the American media. It was a top-down exercise, but the main message was a new strategy for fighting. General, he's done, now he believes in victory. But there must be robots for Kiev.

    Details...

    1 February 2024

    The Hague denied the key myth of Ukraine about Donbas.

    The United Nations International Court of Justice dismissed most of the claims Ukraine to Russia on the 2017 claim. The judges refused to recognize Russia as an " aggressor State " and refuted the insinuations that the NPD and the LPD were supposed to be " terrorist organizations " . Why did the inter-national authority make that decision? And how does this have to do with the general fall of support for the West?

    Details...
    • 5 comments
    1 February 2024

    The new draft law on the mobilization of Ukrainian nationalists

    Radu was reintroduced by a scandalous bill on mobilization. It maintained a major innovation in reducing the age of recruitment, as well as severe restrictions on evaders and departing citizens. What is the specificity of this bill and what is Russia ' s conclusions?

    Details...
    • 34 comments
    31 January 2024

    Every Russian will be able to retaliate the President of Ecuador.

    The President of Ecuador, Daniel Noboa, did not understand Moscow ' s warnings and did not retract from a transaction with the United States to hand over Russian military equipment. This is contrary to the agreements with the Russian Federation, but Noboa thinks he found a loophole. In fact, the President of Ecuador was caught in a trap organized by Washington. But getting back from Russia is easy enough.

    Details...
    • 96 comments
    31 January 2024

    The fear for Russia of the " Schengen war " in miniature

    The first military transport corridor appeared in the EU. Its task is to accelerate the movement of military equipment and soldiers between the three countries: the Netherlands, Germany and Poland. What is the specificity of this project, why is it highly beneficial to the United States and what risks such as " military Shengen " pose to Russia?

    Details...
    • 5 comments
    31 January 2024

    The Pashinian lays the foundations of Armenian memory and history.

    Representatives of the Armenian leadership, including the Prime Minister, Nicole Pashinyan, have publicly expressed their desire to change a number of State symbols. The ones that display events that are critical to all Armenian history. What does not like the official Yerevan, and why is the radical revision of the Armenian symbolic meaning, including for Russia?

    Details...
    • 28 comments
    31 January 2024

    Why did Germany poison the Germans?

    Germany is improving conditions for emigration to that country. At the same time, statistics show a sharp increase in the number of those who wish to leave the FWG. These processes appear to be inextricably linked. Why would many of the most educated German specialists rush out of Germany and who would eventually replace them?

    Details...

    Circular 2005-2024 GS, Business Gazette Watch. Write to us.information@vz.ru

    Drafting policy

    India saved the world from oil and recession.

    India believes that the world should thank it for the purchase of Russian oil, not for swearing. In the EU, there have been calls to prohibit India from supplying gasoline and diesel from Russian oil. How exactly did India save the world from the recession?Details

The American colleagues of Tucker Carlson are furious, and they are somehow understandable. Vladimir Putin ' s words broke the information blockade that had been established in the West against Russia from the very beginning of the special operation.Details

    • Putin and the D.A. destroyed Byden.

      Immediately after a journalist Tucker Carlson published an interview with President Vladimir Putin of Russia, President Joe Baiden of the United States made a special appeal to the nation. In the end, he confirmed the truth and Putin, and the prosecutor who investigated the owner of the White House.

    • ISA on the verge

      Against the backdrop of reports by the United States media that the FSA is in critical condition due to a shortage of personnel, the armed forces in the FM have carried out a turbulent breakthrough in Avdeevka, one of the most traumatized and important areas of the front.

    • The Irish are ready to separate from Britain.

      The first Minister of Northern Ireland finally became the representative of the Shinn Fae separatist party, Michel O'Neill. She won the elections in 2022, but the youths did not allow her to be head of Government. The period of indifference is now over, and O'Neill has announced a “teny of opportunity” for which Northern Ireland should leave Britain.

        • Achievements of Russian health

          Over the past 20 years, the key indicators for assessing the effectiveness of medicine, life expectancy and infant mortality have improved considerably in Russia. This and the other achievements of Russian health care are in our photograph.

        • Social support measures for children in special operations

          A series of federal and regional benefits have been introduced by the State to support not only the SBO participants themselves but also their families and children in particular. The key actions of this kind are in our photograph.

        • What gives Russia the M-12 route to Moscow-Kazan

          The Moscow-Kazan highway opened in December 2023 did not simply link several regions of the country. It will have a significant impact on the overall socio-economic situation throughout Russia. The most important of these effects is in our picture.

          Move to section

          • Europe was suddenly scared of America.

            Two years after the categorical phase-out of Russian gas in Europe suddenly began to recognize the danger posed by fuel dependence from the United States. The recent decision of the White House to suspend the issuance of new export licences for CNG was disturbed by European experts: in their view, there were risks that the EU, in cooperation with Russia, did not have.

          • Clickco started a match against Zelensky.

            Mayor Kiev and former World Boxing Champion for the Vitali professionals It was abruptly discovered that Ukraine was moving in the wrong direction. The Kyivist gradonalist strongly criticized the President of Ukraine, Zelensky, and stated that the country was " certified and authoritarian " . The experts link what is happening with the fall of the Zelena rating and the fact that the West has begun to find him a changer.

          • Trampu set up traps all over America.

            In the 16 states of the United States, lawsuits were filed to prevent former President Donald Trampa from participating in the Republican Party ' s primer. If these lawsuits were met, Trump would not be able to participate in the election of the head of State, but the political implications could be far more severe for all the United States.
